channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 沙特阿美首席执行官阿明-纳赛尔（Amin Nasser）表示，由于支持者忽视了对消费者的影响，全球能源转型在大多数方面都 "明显失败"。
item.description:
The global energy transition is "visibly failing" on most fronts as proponents overlook the impacts on consumers, says Saudi Aramco Chief Executive Officer Amin Nasser https://t.co/4WS8V8Vj88

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 通用电气的股价已创下六年多来的新高。但要进一步上涨可能很难。
item.description:
General Electric shares have powered to a more than six-year high. But further gains may be tough to find. https://t.co/9Yga2eSsgj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉正在向他的高级助手们施加更大的压力，要求他们增加开支，加快经济增长，扭转支持率不断下滑的局面。
item.description:
Brazilian President Lula is ratcheting up the pressure on his top aides to boost spending, gin up faster growth and turn around his sinking approval ratings https://t.co/Jg9laWgdAG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 世界银行计划在未来三年内向埃及提供超过 60 亿美元的支持，这是为支撑这个北非国家经济所做的最新努力
item.description:
The World Bank plans on providing more than $6 billion in support to Egypt over the coming three years, the latest effort to shore up the North African nation's economy https://t.co/CAROlYrzJF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 投资管理公司霸菱（Barings）起诉科林西亚全球管理公司（Corinthia Global Management），因为这家新兴的私人信贷资产管理公司挖走了 20 多名员工。
item.description:
Investment manager Barings sued Corinthia Global Management after the upstart private credit asset manager poached more than 20 employees. https://t.co/xl2UL97vwH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 由于待售现房数量有限，加上抵押贷款利率从峰值回落，刺激了需求，3 月份美国住宅建筑商的情绪攀升至八个月来的最高点。
item.description:
Sentiment among US homebuilders climbed to an eight-month high in March as a limited number of existing homes for sale and mortgage rates that are down from their peak spurred demand. https://t.co/Z3zuZqW7Qb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 华尔街关注人工智能，英伟达从美联储手中接过中心舞台
item.description:
Nvidia takes center stage from the Fed as Wall Street dials in on the AI story https://t.co/3TOCbMbTpb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和摩根大通（JPMorgan）正在欧洲债券市场上大举融资，这是今年华尔街首家这样做的银行
item.description:
Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan are piling into Europe's bond market to raise money, the first Wall Street banks to do so this year https://t.co/TSj1532SPO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的资本注入和信用评级上调并不足以让雷蒙德-詹姆斯（Raymond James）相信，这家陷入困境的贷款机构将很快摆脱困境。
item.description:
A capital infusion and credit rating hike at New York Community Bancorp were not enough to convince Raymond James that the embattled lender will get beyond its challenges any time soon https://t.co/LSiUbetZJk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 冰岛财政部长表示，她将努力阻止国有银行 Landsbankinn 收购一家保险公司，因为这与政府政策相悖。
item.description:
Iceland’s finance minister says she will try to prevent state-owned lender Landsbankinn’s purchase of an insurance company as it contradicts government policy https://t.co/YOE9JepTCR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 有影响力的股东咨询公司 Glass Lewis 建议迪斯尼的投资者支持媒体公司管理层与激进分子的斗争。
item.description:
Glass Lewis., the influential shareholder advisory firm, has recommended that investors in Disney back the media company’s management in its battle with activists. https://t.co/RHFy3CpfYB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）上调了对今年美国经济和就业增长的预测，以考虑到移民速度加快的因素。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs has raised its projections for US economic and jobs growth for this year to account for a faster pace of immigration https://t.co/BzGmHSRVNA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 摩尔多瓦总统马亚-桑杜（Maia Sandu）宣布将于今年 10 月就加入欧盟问题举行全民公决，以确保这个拥有 260 万人口的国家在加入欧盟方面继续取得进展。
item.description:
Moldovan President Maia Sandu has announced that a referendum on European Union membership will be held in October as she seeks to ensure the nation of 2.6 million maintains progress toward joining the bloc. https://t.co/GT3WHy7Ozd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）宣布在克里姆林宫严密控制的总统选举中取得创纪录胜利的第二天，俄罗斯正在纪念普京吞并克里米亚十周年。
item.description:
A day after Vladimir Putin claimed a record victory in presidential elections tightly controlled by the Kremlin, Russia is marking the 10th anniversary of his annexation of Crimea that began the march to war in Ukraine https://t.co/VlNz4EZVF1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 两位加州参议员公布了一项法案，旨在填补湾区交通系统的预算缺口，并为全市 27 个不同的运营机构带来一些秩序。
item.description:
Two California senators unveiled a bill aimed at plugging the budget gaps in the Bay Area's transportation systems as well as bringing some order to the 27 different agencies operating across the city. https://t.co/VHjc38B6WV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 法国能源监管机构表示，与英国建立第四条电力连接线将有助于保障电力供应安全，而此前由于英国脱欧带来的不确定性，该机构拒绝了这一提议。
item.description:
France’s energy regulator says a fourth power link to the UK would help safeguard security of supply, after previously rejecting the proposal because of the uncertainties created by Brexit https://t.co/N8G2p0lqoO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 普京出人意料地获胜，苹果和谷歌联手开发人工智能......在《彭博早间新闻》播客中获取您一天开始所需的所有新闻：
item.description:
Putin's unsurprising win, plus Apple & Google team up on AI.
Get all the news you need to start your day in the Bloomberg Daybreak podcast: https://t.co/PgptbVANxH

— Bloomberg Radio (@BloombergRadio) March 18, 2024

item.title: 伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）启动了竞选连任的第三个任期，他承诺在本十年结束前新建 40,000 套议会住宅，作为解决城市住房短缺问题的努力的一部分。
item.description:
London Mayor Sadiq Khan, who launched his re-election campaign for a third term, pledges to build 40,000 new council homes by the end of the decade as part of efforts to address a housing shortage in the city https://t.co/8N6nrHkl56

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 教育技术公司和词典出版商大英百科全书正在寻求约 10 亿美元的首次公开募股估值。
item.description:
Encyclopaedia Britannica, the education technology company and dictionary publisher, is seeking a valuation of about $1 billion its IPO. https://t.co/8zM2eruXN5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 克罗地亚最高法院称，佐兰-米拉诺维奇总统突然决定参加下月的总理选举，这与其国家元首的身份 "不可调和"。
item.description:
Croatia’s highest court says President Zoran Milanovic’s abrupt decision to run in next month’s election to become prime minister is “irreconcilable” with his role as head of state https://t.co/xXlt2ElZGN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）处罚了两家基金管理公司，称其使用人工智能的说法不实。
item.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission penalized two money managers for what it says were bogus claims about their use of artificial intelligence. https://t.co/pccx3a0J17

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 沙特财富基金的战略、阿联酋的地缘政治灵活性以及阿布扎比为对冲基金铺开红地毯。阅读中东通讯
item.description:
Saudi wealth fund's strategy, the UAE's geopolitical flex and Abu Dhabi rolls out the red carpet for hedge funds. Read the Middle East newsletter https://t.co/WkRGDcMI9b

item.title: 伊拉克表示将在未来几个月内把石油出口量降至每天 330 万桶
item.description:
Iraq says it will cut oil exports to 3.3 million barrels a day in the coming months https://t.co/QytXyYkxRz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 今天彭博社绿色气象雷达上有什么？美国国家气象局称，预计美国南部从阿肯色州到北卡罗来纳州中部将出现作物死亡的冰冻天气
item.description:
What's on Bloomberg Green's weather radar today? A crop-killing freeze is forecast for the US South from Arkansas to central North Carolina, the National Weather Service said https://t.co/H0VC03Tycp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 巴西经济在年初放缓，在央行本周可能再次降息之前，经济活动继续减弱。
item.description:
Brazil’s economy slowed at the start of the year, with activity continuing to wane ahead of another likely central bank interest rate cut this week. https://t.co/QogQpm1mIL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 能源成本反弹，加拿大工厂价格上涨 0.7
item.description:
Canada Factory Prices Up 0.7% as Energy Costs Rebound https://t.co/lppVXxMbDN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 今年 CERAWeek 的主题是能源转型，但第一天的焦点将是化石燃料的主要生产国，@sjcasey 写道。
item.description:
CERAWeek's theme this year is the energy transition, but the firm focus on day one will be the top producers of fossil fuels, writes @sjcasey https://t.co/sZn8smHnfR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 德国最高银行监管机构称，德国少数银行可能在商业地产领域承担了过多风险，但总体而言，该行业足以抵御资产类别的动荡。
item.description:
Germany’s top banking regulator says a few banks in the country may have taken too much risk in commercial property, while the industry by and large is strong enough to weather the turmoil in the asset class https://t.co/D4Le9riJtj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯国营油轮公司 PJSC Sovcomflot 表示，美国制裁给其运营带来了压力，这是美国制裁措施使俄罗斯石油运输复杂化的最新迹象。
item.description:
Russia’s state oil tanker company PJSC Sovcomflot says that US sanctions are putting pressure on its operations, the latest sign that the measures are complicating the delivery of the nation’s petroleum https://t.co/D8aNYSmFCr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 法航荷航法国分公司预计夏季长途航线运力将比去年增加 9
item.description:
The French arm of Air France-KLM expects to offer 9% more summer capacity than last year on long-distance routes https://t.co/d5DcfcemkR
